name: Xendit
headline: Provides payment infrastructure for Southeast Asia
description:
Xendit provides payment solutions that simplify the payment process for businesses in Southeast Asia, including Indonesia, Philippines, Malaysia, Thailand and Vietnam from SMEs, e-commerce startups to giant corporations. 

Xendit provides a secure, easy-to-integrate payment system, and seamless payment experience supported by great customer service. With a diverse range of products, Xendit’s system can accept payments from virtual accounts, credit and debit cards, eWallets, retail outlets, and also online installments. 

With our aim to build Indonesia and the Philippines’s payment infrastructure, Xendit is on its way shaping the next generation of unicorns by empowering startups to grow exponentially through the products we offer. 

Xendit is licensed and regulated in multiple countries in Southeast Asia

## Skip the fuss, scale things fast
Focus on growth and leave the groundwork to us. From regional expertise to efficiency and security, we’ve got you covered.
###  From local to global, from global to local 
Hit the ground running when you expand your business across Southeast Asia. With our deep payment stacks and intimate knowledge of local regulations, you don’t have to spend months integrating with every bank and e-wallet for online payments. 
![](https://www.xendit.co/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/Frame-51396home-skip-fuss-1-2.png)

Keep excessive manual work at bay. Need help? Contact us anytime and get immediate support from knowledgeable human agents—even in the middle of the night! Don’t get caught in an infinite loop talking to robots. 
![](https://www.xendit.co/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/Frame-51396home-skip-fuss-3.png)

## FAQ
What is Xendit?
Xendit is a financial technology company that enables fast and secure payments for businesses in Southeast Asia. From SMEs and e-commerce startups to large enterprises, Xendit powers business expansion across the region.
As a leading payment gateway, Xendit allows businesses to accept payments through 100+ popular payment methods, as well as offer a variety of payment solutions in Indonesia, the Philippines, Malaysia, Thailand and Vietnam.
Which payment solutions does Xendit provide?
Xendit offers comprehensive payment solutions for businesses. These include:
  * [Accepting payments](https://www.xendit.co/</en/products/all-payment-methods/>) through payment methods such as credit card, virtual accounts, bank transfers, e-wallets, QRIS, and more
  * [Sending payouts](https://www.xendit.co/</en/products/automated-payouts/>) to 450+ banks and e-wallets anytime, even on weekends and public holidays
  * [Subscription payments](https://www.xendit.co/</en/products/recurring/>) to automate recurring payments through credit card, e-wallets, and direct debit
  * [Platform payments](https://www.xendit.co/</en/products/xenplatform/>) to easily manage money flows for thousands of partners and sub-merchants on your platform
  * Getting [quick financing](https://www.xendit.co/<https:/dev-web.xendit.co/en/products/xencapital/>) for your business


How much does Xendit charge for its payment services?
You can sign up for and integrate with Xendit entirely free of charge. Charges are only incurred on successful transactions.
Charges for Xendit's online payment services vary depending on your transaction type and usage volume. Aside from payment transaction fees, usage of some Xendit products, such as subscriptions and some types of notifications (e.g. SMS) etc. may incur separate charges.
For more details regarding our fees, please contact the [Xendit support](https://www.xendit.co/<https:/dev-web.xendit.co/en/contact/>) team or visit the [pricing](https://www.xendit.co/<https:/dev-web.xendit.co/en/pricing/>) page.
How do I start accepting payments with Xendit?
To start accepting payments with Xendit, register and create an account [here](https://www.xendit.co/<https:/dashboard.xendit.co/register/1>). After that, you can integrate Xendit's payment solution into your website or app by using our available [integrations](https://www.xendit.co/<https:/docs.xendit.co/integrations>) to start receiving payments.
Should you encounter any issues, [contact us](https://www.xendit.co/</en/contact/>) anytime–24/7, and our support team will be able assist you with your integration process.
How do I withdraw money received through Xendit and how soon can I access it?
Payments you receive through Xendit will be available for withdrawal after the settlement time. This settlement time varies depending on payment methods, and for some payment methods, it can even be instant.
For some payment methods where the settlement times are not instant, you also have the option of [receiving instant payouts](https://www.xendit.co/</en/products/early-settlement/>) at a small fee.
You can easily [withdraw your funds](https://www.xendit.co/<https:/docs.xendit.co/withdrawal#sidebar>) and send them to your chosen destination bank account at any time via the Xendit dashboard, free of charge.

## FAQ
What is Xendit?
Xendit is a financial technology company that enables fast and secure payments for businesses in Southeast Asia. From SMEs and e-commerce startups to large enterprises, Xendit powers business expansion across the region.
As a leading payment gateway, Xendit allows businesses to accept payments through 100+ popular payment methods, as well as offer a variety of payment solutions in Indonesia, the Philippines, Malaysia, Thailand and Vietnam.
Which payment solutions does Xendit provide?
Xendit offers comprehensive payment solutions for businesses. These include:
  * Accepting payments⟨17⟩ through payment methods such as credit card, virtual accounts, bank transfers, e-wallets, QRIS, and more
  * Sending payouts⟨22⟩ to 450+ banks and e-wallets anytime, even on weekends and public holidays
  * Subscription payments⟨80⟩ to automate recurring payments through credit card, e-wallets, and direct debit
  * Platform payments⟨26⟩ to easily manage money flows for thousands of partners and sub-merchants on your platform
  * Getting quick financing⟨81⟩ for your business


How much does Xendit charge for its payment services?
You can sign up for and integrate with Xendit entirely free of charge. Charges are only incurred on successful transactions.
Charges for Xendit's online payment services vary depending on your transaction type and usage volume. Aside from payment transaction fees, usage of some Xendit products, such as subscriptions and some types of notifications (e.g. SMS) etc. may incur separate charges.
For more details regarding our fees, please contact the Xendit support⟨82⟩ team or visit the pricing⟨83⟩ page.
How do I start accepting payments with Xendit?
To start accepting payments with Xendit, register and create an account here⟨2⟩. After that, you can integrate Xendit's payment solution into your website or app by using our available integrations⟨84⟩ to start receiving payments.
Should you encounter any issues, contact us⟨85⟩ anytime–24/7, and our support team will be able assist you with your integration process.
How do I withdraw money received through Xendit and how soon can I access it?
Payments you receive through Xendit will be available for withdrawal after the settlement time. This settlement time varies depending on payment methods, and for some payment methods, it can even be instant.
For some payment methods where the settlement times are not instant, you also have the option of receiving instant payouts⟨33⟩ at a small fee.
You can easily withdraw your funds⟨86⟩ and send them to your chosen destination bank account at any time via the Xendit dashboard, free of charge.

**Company Overview: Xendit**

**Founded**: 2015  
**Location**: Jakarta, Indonesia  
**Team Size**: Approximately 700 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch**: S15  
**Group Partner**: Gustaf Alstromer  
**Website**: [xendit.co](https://www.xendit.co)  
**Industry Tags**: Fintech, Payments

---

**Mission**: Xendit aims to provide a comprehensive payment infrastructure for Southeast Asia, empowering businesses of all sizes—from SMEs to large corporations—to streamline their payment processes.

### What They Do:

Xendit started by simplifying payment solutions in Southeast Asia, particularly in countries like Indonesia, the Philippines, Malaysia, Thailand, and Vietnam. They offer a secure and easy-to-integrate payment system that enhances the payment experience for users, backed up by exceptional customer service. 

Their platform accepts more than 100 payment methods, including:

- Virtual accounts
- Credit and debit cards
- E-wallets
- Retail outlets
- Online installments

Xendit is not just about transactions; it’s about enabling growth. By building the payment infrastructure for Indonesia and the Philippines, Xendit is helping to nurture the next generation of successful startups, making it a pivotal player in the fintech space.

### Key Services:
- **Payment Solutions**: A single solution for receiving and sending payments, efficient for all business operations.
- **Business Operations**: Tools for managing treasury and expenses, enabling corporate finance solutions like corporate cards and financing.
- **Financial Products**: Options for international payments and e-money solutions that can be seamlessly integrated into existing applications.

### Regulatory Compliance:
Xendit is licensed and regulated across multiple Southeast Asian nations, ensuring it operates under the guidance of local regulations.

### Customer Focus:
Xendit targets a wide array of clients, including startups in the e-commerce sector, larger corporations, and marketplace platforms looking to streamline money flows efficiently.

### Use Cases:
- **Online Businesses**: Enhancing transaction capabilities and improving user experience.
- **Marketplaces**: Managing partner and sub-merchant payments effortlessly.
- **Subscription Services**: Automating payments to improve customer retention rates.
